MenuEntry.label: <font color=#FFBE96>Request Leet Duel</font>
MenuEntry.tooltip_body: This requests a leet pet duel with you current target.

MenuEntry.label: <font color=#FFBE96>Accept Leet Duel</font>
MenuEntry.tooltip_body: This accepts a leet pet duel requested by an other player.

MenuEntry.label: <font color=#FFBE96>Decline Leet Duel</font>
MenuEntry.tooltip_body: This declines a leet pet duel requested by an other player.

MenuEntry.label: <font color=#FFBE96>Stop Leet Duel</font>
MenuEntry.tooltip_body: This stops a running leet pet duel.
